title: UFYB 182: Greatest Hits Vol 5. What About Sexism?
itunes:title: Greatest Hits Vol 5. What About Sexism?
description:
Are your efforts to challenge sexism, racism, and other oppressive systems leaving you frustrated, overwhelmed, and burnt out? Tune in to this week’s Greatest Hits episode to learn how to use coaching tools to create social change without draining yourself or feeling angry all the time. When you learn how to liberate yourself from fear and judgment, you create endless energy to liberate the world.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://unfuckyourbrain.com/182
content:encoded:
